**As a** System Administrator 
 **I need** the ability to reset the counter  
 **So that** I can redo counting from the start
   
 ### Details and Assumptions
 * Documents given
   
 ### Acceptance Criteria  
   
 ```gherkin
 Given [some context]
 When [certain action is taken]
 Then [the outcome of action is observed]
 ```
